dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT v.process_control_request_id job_id, v.parameter_id, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(v.next_process_time AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI PM') next_process_time, TO_CHAR((v.cycle_duration / 60 / 60 / 24), '99') || ' day(s)' cycle_duration FROM process_control_request pr CROSS JOIN (SELECT pr1.process_control_request_id, pr1.next_process_time, pr1.cycle_duration, (CASE WHEN INSTR(topic_parameters,'CUSTOMERID=') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CUSTOMERID=')+11,25),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CUSTOMERID=')+11,25),'&')-1) WHEN INSTR(topic_parameters,'BROKERID=') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'BROKERID=')+9,25),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'BROKERID=')+9,25),'&')-1) ELSE NULL END) parameter_id, SUBSTR(topic_parameters,27,INSTR(topic_parameters,'-queryString')-28) report_name FROM process_control_request pr1 WHERE NOT pr1.next_process_time IS NULL AND pr1.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO') v WHERE pr.process_control_request_id = v.process_control_request_id AND NOT v.report_name IS NULL AND NOT v.parameter_id IS NULL AND pr.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' ORDER BY v.process_control_request_id
